page.title: 15CLUBS
page.content: We went round the school and asked everyone what sports clubs they belonged to. There are alot of clubs in the Sonning Common area. Most people went swimming,there were 49 that either go to a club or swimming lessons. 34 play football,33 people go to gymnastics,15 play tennis,31 go to judo or budo,11 belong to netball clubs,10 people play cricket,7 people play squash,10 play rugby,11 play tablen tennis,2 play snooker and 1 person playsn pool.There is a football club that I go to that is aged from 9 to 15. Each year people get medals,sometimes trophies and we all get certificates . Here are some more clubs: badminton, boxing, bowls and archery.
